subject: Football
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Concussions
Sports Injuries
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
lead_paragraph: The wrongful-death suit, filed in Wisconsin, accuses the youth football league of failing to warn players about, and protect them from, the dangers of head trauma.
snippet: The wrongful-death suit, filed in Wisconsin, accuses the youth football league of failing to warn players about, and protect them from, the dangers of head trauma.
